website_summaries.verdict: These eye drops stimulate the body's natural defense systems to help reduce eye itchiness.
pros: Contains eyebright and other natural ingredients to help users address itchy eyes, eye redness, and other eye allergy symptoms
Does not contain any harsh chemicals
Help alleviate eye allergy symptoms in just minutes
cons: Expensive and provides inferior results in comparison to similar eye drops

customer_reviews.title: Best over the counter stuff money can buy
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this brand since it’s homeopathic. I have horrible eye allergies and I don’t like the prescription stuff because you can taste it once it travels to your sinus. Over the counter stuff just burns my eyes way too much and I have to use it multiple times a day. This stuff is amazing I can use it multiple times no irritation it does take a bit longer to work but I’d rather not have artificial stuff in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Hasuno Hana_16

customer_reviews.title: Better than a prescription
customer_reviews.text: I am not a medical doctor. But this is a great product. Did the job
customer_reviews.author: Daro

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from dry eyes, and other brands kept making my eyes burn even more. This is perfect, what a relief!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Itchy, watering, feeling like you have something in your eyes? These eye drops handle it all. They also feel so soothing and are so easy to use with the built in eye dropper. I would definitely recommend these eye drops.
customer_reviews.author: Geri M

customer_reviews.title: Much better than traditional drops
customer_reviews.text: I've had bad eye allergies for the past few years and ran the gambit of both OTC and prescription eye drops. At best, they lessened symptoms, but not for very long. I noticed an immediate improvement with these homeopathic drops, with less itching and redness, and only need to use them once to twice a day. The jury's out still on the long term benefit, but I'm really happy to find something that really eliminates my symptoms!
customer_reviews.author: owlclaw

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS HAVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Similasan Allergy Eye Relief drops for years. WONT BE WITHOUT IT!!! It really works. I LOVE that it is natural without harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT for sensitive eyes! Burns more than allergies...
customer_reviews.text: I put in the eye drops as the instructions say and immediately after they are extremely itchy (more Itchy than pollen causes them to be). Once i could not stop itching until my eye was covered in a layer of mucous and i could not open my eye... would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works OK, not the best
customer_reviews.text: Bottles came smaller then I thought they were. It works ok, but it does burn for the 1st few seconds but not terribly bad. Im allergic to make up so I thought this would help with that, unfortunately it didn't. It moisturized my eyes and helped for seasonal allergies though.

They totally stop the itching and tearing and all the allergy symptoms within the first day. We keep them up throughout allergy season (both in the spring and fall) and highly recommend them to others.

customer_reviews.title: My eyes love this stuff.

It is a very nice product, and makes my eyes feel good too.

product_meta.title: Similasan Allergy Eye Relief Eye Drops 0.33 Ounce Bottle, for Temporary Relief from Red Eyes, Itchy Eyes, Burning Eyes, and Watery Eyes, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Allergies in full bloom? Redness, itching, burning, stinging, and irritation are common symptoms of allergy eyes. We all want our eyes to feel better during allergy season, but many allergy sufferers are concerned about the chemicals found in allergy eye drops. Traditional over-the-counter allergy drops use chemicals such as antihistamines or vasoconstrictors to mask symptoms. Vasoconstrictors may actually worsen redness symptoms if used more than directed (usually 4 times a day maximum). Similasan of Switzerland works differently, by using natural botanical extracts to stimulate the body's natural defenses and target the root cause of allergy eye symptoms. Similasan products are made without harsh chemicals, so you can use them as often as needed. Can be used with contact lenses. Drops will not damage lenses but performance might be better when applied without lenses. If you have redness, itchiness or irritation, it is best to avoid lenses for a while. Trusted by pharmacists and families in Switzerland for 40 years, Similasan is a leading Swiss brand of remedies that use natural active ingredients instead of harsh chemicals to keep families healthy. Our state of the art facility located near the Swiss Alps makes over 190 popular remedies for children and adults. Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.
feature_bullets: Similasan Allergy Eye Relief drops provide temporary relief from symptoms of eye allergies like redness, itching, burning, stinging, and irritation. Use as often as needed with no known side effects.
Similasan Allergy Eye Relief eye drops stimulate the body's natural defenses instead of masking allergy symptoms like red eyes, itchy eyes, burning eyes, stinging eyes, irritated eyes, watering eyes.
Similasan homeopathic eye drops are made with natural active ingredients like eyebright, not harsh chemicals. Similasan eye drops do not contain vasoconstrictors: chemicals that cause rebound effect.
For over 40 years, Similasan has been used by pharmacists and families in Switzerland. Similasan is a leading brand of homeopathic remedies with natural active ingredients to keep families healthy.
Similasan is a Swiss brand dedicated to helping families feel good about feeling better. Our gentle eye drops provide natural temporary relief from allergy eye symptoms.
